LanguageData.ResearchPal.BuildingResearchTreeAsync: Start Building Research Tree on Background
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShowNotificationPopupTip: Whenever you finish research, pause and show the default notification.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldSeparateByTechLevelsTi: Otherwise use a more dense layout (REQUIRES RESTART)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldPauseOnOpenTip: Whenever the game should pause when the research tab is displayed.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldResetOnOpenTip: Clear filtering and reset scroll position.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AlignCloserToAncestorsTip: Heuristically put research nodes closer to their prerequisites instead of children. (REQUIRES RESTART)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.MinimumSeparateModTechTip: Minimum number of added techs for a mod to be placed separately from the main vanilla tech-tree. (REQUIRES RESTART)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.GroupModTechsTip: Place researches from the same mod together ignoring heuristics. (REQUIRE RESTART)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.SearchByDescriptionTip: Searches will match the keyword against descriptions of the researches (may worsen search performance)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.DelayLayoutGenerationTip: Generate layout at the first time the research tree is used, instead of when loading the game
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AsyncLoadingOnStartupTip: Generate layout on background when game loads
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ProgressTooltipTip: Display research progress in a tooltip for in-progress project (Warning: currently may not work properly)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AlwaysDisplayProgressTip: Always display the rest of the points needed to complete a project, doesn't affect the display when zooming out
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShowQueueIndexOnQueueTip: Display index icons on researches in the research queue.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.DontIgnoreHiddenPrerequisite: Fix an old bug of the original ResearchPal that ignores hidden prerequisites. You should always turn this option on for a more balanced gameplay. Being able to turning off this option is for existing save game strategy compatibility. (REQUIRE RESTART)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.NeedsRestart: Research settings changed, restart RimWorld to apply the change.
